price: ߒߠߋ ߢߌ߲߭ ߠߋ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߟߍߙߊ ߟߊߖߌ߰ ߸ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߐ߰ ߢߌߡߊ ߟߎ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ߦߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
